abstract.t: This document specifies the protocol used by IPv6 nodes comprisingstateful packet filters to discover the transport addresses oflistening applications (that is, application endpoints for whichincoming traffic may be administratively prohibited).Comments are solicited and should be sent to the author and the V6OPSResidential CPE Design Team mailing list at<v6ops-residential-cpe-design-team@external.cisco.com>.
